lead_paragraph: Close friends and advisers of Senator Roland W. Burris say that the financial debt he has racked up in legal bills and other expenses during his short stint in the Senate is taking a toll.
snippet: Close friends and advisers of Senator Roland W. Burris say that the financial debt he has racked up in legal bills and other expenses during his short stint in the Senate is taking a toll.

headline.main: Debt Weighs Heavily on Burris, Friends Say
headline.seo: Debt Weighs on Roland Burris, Friends Say
